actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution providing pay comparability adjustments for certain House employees whose pay rates are specifically fixed by House resolutions.

summary.text: Provides that, until otherwise provided by law, effective as of January 1, 1973, the per annum gross rate of pay of each employee (except an employee who is an elected officer of the House) whose pay is disbursed by the Clerk of the House and is fixed at a specific rate by House resolution is increased by an amount equal to 5.14 percent of his per annum gross rate of pay. Provides that no rate of pay shall be increased by reason of the adoption of this resolution to an amount in excess of the rate of basic pay of level V of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: Resolution providing pay comparability adjustments for certain House employees whose pay rates are specifically fixed by House resolutions.
